heading: Sign hanger place of business
text:
Every licensed sign hanger shall have a place of business within the city and shall
  display prominently at such place of business a plate or sign marked with the words “sign hanger” and the license number
  immediately thereunder. A licensed sign hanger shall be a sole proprietor, a partner in the partnership or an officer of the
  corporation and shall be allowed to associate his or her license with only one other sign hanger business. Such businesses sh all be
  located at the same place of business.
